amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund to allow for deficit-neutral legislation that would provide seniors with a prescription drug benefit option that is affordable, user-friendly, and administered directly by the Secretary of Health and Human Services.

action.text: Amendment SA 3164 proposed by Senator Stabenow.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3164 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 71.
